name: Sasha and Sir Plutarch's Fabulous Rmventure
name_original: Sasha and Sir Plutarch's Fabulous Rmventure
description:
Sasha, hot and upcoming game developer is ready to take her first steps, but her skillset is not complete and she needs the aid of other individuals to accomplish it. Enjoy an humorous romp through town accompanied by your talking rat in this simple but fun adventure game.
Controls:

- Arrow keys Movement
- Z Action/accept
- X Open menu/cancel
- A Skip dialogue
